author: captainmidnight
description:
This video is sponsored by Brilliant. Go to https://brilliant.org/midnight or scan the QR code onscreen, Brilliant’s also given our viewers 20% off an annual Premium subscription, which gives you unlimited daily access to everything on Brilliant.
Dungeons & Dragons has a couple theatrical releases under its belt, but audiences have not shown up for them. Even when Honor Among Thieves was pretty good! So what happened? Here's my theory.
Read my comic BINARY SEA on Amazon Kindle: https://a.co/d/9JfoZC0

title: Why D&D Movies Keep Failing
